âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Interactive find and replace in the terminal â€¢ Supports fixed string and regular expression search â€¢ Respects .gitignore and .ignore files â€¢ Capture groups in regex replacements â€¢ Opens selected file at relevant line in editor (defined by EDITOR env variable)
ðŸ“– Summary: Scooter is a terminal UI application for interactively finding and replacing text within files. It supports both fixed string and regular expression searches, allows for capture groups in replacements, and respects `.gitignore` and `.ignore` files. It also provides features for opening files in an editor at the relevant line and for including/excluding files based on glob patterns.
